2494.verse: وَكَمْ|And how many|117|133|6245$قَصَمْنَا|We (have) shattered|159|192|11727$مِن|of|50|83|53$قَرْيَةٍ|a town|66|99|2319$كَانَتْ|(that) was|91|124|888$ظَالِمَةً|unjust,|78|94|11728$وَأَنشَأْنَا|and We produced|136|211|5431$بَعْدَهَا|after them|90|240|10931$قَوْمًا ءَاخَرِينَ|another people.|150|225|11729$

2494.verse: And how many a city which was unjust have We shattered and produced after it another people.

2495.verse: And when its inhabitants perceived Our punishment, at once they fled from it.

2496.verse: [Some angels said], "Do not flee but return to where you were given luxury and to your homes - perhaps you will be questioned."

2497.verse: They said, "O woe to us! Indeed, we were wrongdoers."

2498.verse: And that declaration of theirs did not cease until We made them [as] a harvest [mowed down], extinguished [like a fire].

2499.verse: And We did not create the heaven and earth and that between them in play.

2500.verse: Had We intended to take a diversion, We could have taken it from [what is] with Us - if [indeed] We were to do so.

2501.verse: Rather, We dash the truth upon falsehood, and it destroys it, and thereupon it departs. And for you is destruction from that which you describe.

2502.verse: To Him belongs whoever is in the heavens and the earth. And those near Him are not prevented by arrogance from His worship, nor do they tire.

2503.verse: They exalt [Him] night and day [and] do not slacken.

2504.verse: Or have men taken for themselves gods from the earth who resurrect [the dead]?

2505.verse: Had there been within the heavens and earth gods besides Allah, they both would have been ruined. So exalted is Allah, Lord of the Throne, above what they describe.

2506.verse: He is not questioned about what He does, but they will be questioned.

2507.verse: Or have they taken gods besides Him? Say, [O Muhammad], "Produce your proof. This [Qur'an] is the message for those with me and the message of those before me." But most of them do not know the truth, so they are turning away.
